about_the_game:
New Orleans is trembling! The city is decked out in holiday colors as Mardi Gras festivities are in full swing! Talented half-blood wizard Elizabeth is ready to lend a helping hand, but are her intentions really so pure? Meanwhile, the world of Men and Others is frozen in anticipation.... Something big is coming, something that could turn everything upside down! And you, Magical Detective, are at the center of all these events! After all, no murderer can resist you and no evil spirit can hide! But be careful... Even you can feel the pull of temptation... And what if it's already crawled deep into your heart?!
So, here we are, in shadow dance,
And a magic hand falls from above.
Are you afraid of losing chance
To run away from evil's love?

This Collector's Edition includes:

🏰 Unravel Mysteries in Mardi Gras: Dive into the heart of New Orleans during the exuberant Mardi Gras celebrations. Play as a Magical Detective tasked with protecting the delicate balance between Humans and the Others amidst an atmosphere of magic and mystery!

🏰 Embark on a Magical Detective Adventure: With the assistance of Elizabeth, a talented half-blood wizard, navigate a world where your detective skills will decide the fate of both Men and Others. Trust is a luxury in a city where every shadow could hide a secret!

🏰 Solve Puzzles and Collect Items: Challenge your intellect with intricate puzzles and collect crucial items to uncover hidden secrets. Your journey will take you through beautifully illustrated scenes accompanied by captivating music!

🏰 Control the Magical World's Fate: Complete the main game and unlock achievements, adding depth to your adventure. With every decision, remember that the future of the magical and human worlds rests in your hands. Can you resist the pull of temptation and protect the secrets of the Others?

🏰 Atmospheric Artwork and Music: Immerse yourself in the unique atmosphere of New Orleans' biggest celebration, enhanced by stunning artwork and an immersive soundtrack. Each scene in Magic City Detective is a feast for the senses, setting the stage for an unforgettable adventure!
